short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remainder of your life in weeks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspired by Tim Urban's Ted Talk [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arj7oStGLkU], this extension will show you how many weeks you have left to live. Each box equals one week.
